events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred last night involving another vehicle on the highway.
The claim was examined and categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords related to vehicle collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the auto collision claim and reach out to the customer promptly.
The customer received an acknowledgement of their auto accident claim along with next steps for the process.
Request sent to the customer for the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and witness statements.
The customer submitted all requested documents including photos and the official police collision report.
Investigation into the auto accident claim started, reviewing all provided evidence and reports for accuracy.
Investigation concluded with findings supporting the customer’s version of the car collision event.
A fair settlement proposal was communicated to the customer covering all damages and related expenses.
The customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and handling.
The car accident claim was officially approved after the customer agreed to the settlement terms presented.
Payment covering damages to the insured vehicle was issued to the customer’s bank account successfully.
The auto accident claim file was closed following full payment and mutual agreement from all parties.
All records related to this auto accident claim have been archived securely for future reference if needed.
